column6: SIEGE TIE-IN The New Avengers are being hunted at the worst possible moment. The Hood has powered up his crew in ways that the Avengers can't possibly imagine. But they must find a way in order to save Asgard from Osborn's advancing forces.
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave McCaig
